descriptionHtml: Financial Trading App
descriptionShort: Financial Trading App
title: AVA Social

creator: Pelican Exchange
descriptionHtml:
AVA Social lets you execute trades, copy experts and message other investors all on one platform. Chat, trade, copy, earn, all on the go. We connect you to the traders that matter.

• Execute trades from hundreds of global markets 24hrs a day
• Follow and copy trades from other users
• Auto-copy expert traders
• Talk to other traders and learn from the best
• See trader performance
• Create your own chat groups
• Follow traders and receive their trade updates
• Join Mentor groups, learn and follow their signals

...and much more.

Download AVA Social to start trading now.

descriptionShort: Copy experts on our financial trading app
title: AVA Social

creator: Pelican Exchange
descriptionHtml:
Next Level Social Trading !

AvaSocial is a PERFECT copy-trading solution for traders of all levels - from a true beginner to a highly experienced veteran.

What Can You Find on AvaSocial?
The AvaSocial trading app includes a wide range of instruments to invest in and copy trade. There are more than 250 Forex pairs (like EUR USD & GBP USD), commodities (like Oil & Gold), indices (like NASDAQ & Dow-Jones), stocks, and much more!

Enjoy a smooth trading experience with specific sections for sharing ideas, group discussions, finding & filtering users to follow, quickly accessing your active positions, getting trading signals, or even sharing your trades & ideas via social media!

The AvaSocial trading app enables users to copy-trade, monitor their accounts, engage in social trading and follow top traders from all over the globe. Market leading news and trading insights with daily updates across FOREX trading, ETF trading, STOCK trading, Indices trading and more.

AvaSocial Features:
➤ Execute trades from hundreds of global markets 24hrs a day
➤ Follow and copy trades from other users
➤ Auto-copy expert traders
➤ Talk to other traders and learn from the best
➤ See trader performance
➤ Create your own chat groups
➤ Follow traders and receive their trade updates
➤ Join Mentor groups, learn and follow their signals

Who is AvaTrade?
AvaTrade is an AWARD-WINNING online CFD broker 🏆 with offices around the globe and regulation in 5 continents. The company provides multiple trading platforms, including on-the-go online trading with step-by-step guidance on opening forex trades, CFDs on commodities, Indices, Stocks, Options, ETFs & bonds.

An Award-Winning Broker:
🏆 Best mobile trading platform – 2022
🏆 Best Fixed spread broker – 2022
🏆 Best educational Broker United Kingdom – 2022
🏆 Most innovative CFD broker United Kingdom – 2022

78% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.
descriptionShort: Automate your trading by copying expert traders & skilled investors.
title: AvaSocial: Copy Trade Together

creator: Pelican Exchange
descriptionHtml:
Next Level Social Trading!
Perfect copy-trading solution for traders of all levels.

Trading solution from a true beginner to a highly experienced veteran. Social trading is a great way for novice traders to learn the basics of investing, as they can follow experienced traders, learn their patterns, see how they interpret market conditions and copy all or some of their trades.

Experienced traders meanwhile can not only share their vast experience, but also use social investing to help diversify their portfolio, while gaining additional ideas and points of view.

And AvaSocial combines all of that, and much more in a single highly intuitive and useful app.

What Can You Find on AvaSocial?
The AvaSocial trading app includes a wide range of instruments to invest in and copy trade. There are more than 250 Forex pairs (like EUR USD & GBP USD), commodities (like Oil & Gold), indices (like NASDAQ & Dow-Jones), stocks, and much more!

Enjoy a smooth trading experience with specific sections for sharing ideas, group discussions, finding & filtering users to follow, quickly accessing your active positions, getting trading signals, or even sharing your trades & ideas via social media!

The AvaSocial trading app enables users to copy-trade, monitor their accounts, engage in social trading and follow top traders from all over the globe. Market leading news and trading insights with daily updates across FOREX trading, ETF trading, STOCK trading, Indices trading and more.

AvaSocial Features:
➤ Execute trades from hundreds of global markets 24hrs a day
➤ Follow and copy trades from other users
➤ Auto-copy expert traders
➤ Talk to other traders and learn from the best
➤ See trader performance
➤ Create your own chat groups
➤ Follow traders and receive their trade updates
➤ Join Mentor groups, learn and follow their signals

Global Regulated Broker
Safe trading begins with a global regulated broker.
Avatrade has regulatory licenses across five continents. Start experimenting in forex trading on the AvaSocial app today – download it now!

AvaTrade is an AWARD-WINNING online CFD broker 🏆 with offices around the globe and regulation in 5 continents. The company provides multiple trading platforms, including on-the-go online trading with step-by-step guidance on opening forex trades, CFDs on commodities (like Oil & Gold), Indices (like NASDAQ & Dow-Jones), Stocks, Options, ETFs & bonds.

AvaTrade makes stock trading simple and intuitive with 1-click trading, optimised charting, secure payments and fast withdrawals; CFDs on Forex, Indices, Stocks, EFTs and Bonds trading are also available on the AvaSocial trading app!

An Award-Winning Broker:
🏆 Best mobile trading platform – 2022
🏆 Best Fixed spread broker – 2022
🏆 Best educational Broker United Kingdom – 2022
🏆 Most innovative CFD broker United Kingdom – 2022

78% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

AvaTrade is an AWARD-WINNING online CFD broker 🏆 with offices around the globe and regulation in 5 continents. The company provides multiple trading platforms, including on-the-go online trading with step-by-step guidance on opening forex trades, CFDs on commodities (like Oil & Gold), Indices (like NASDAQ & Dow-Jones), Stocks, Options, ETFs & bonds.

AvaTrade makes stock trading simple and intuitive with 1-click trading, optimised charting, secure payments and fast withdrawals; CFDs on Forex, Indices, Stocks, EFTs and Bonds trading are also available on the AvaSocial trading app!

An Award-Winning Broker:
🏆 Best mobile trading platform – 2022
🏆 Best Fixed spread broker – 2022
🏆 Best educational Broker United Kingdom – 2022
🏆 Most innovative CFD broker United Kingdom – 2022

descriptionShort: Learn from the experts and join the world of social trading with AvaSocial.
title: AvaSocial: Copy Trade Together

creator: Pelican Exchange
descriptionHtml:
AvaSocial - taking social trading to the next level
Use the AvaSocial app to learn from the world’s best experts, before making your move. Connect with your peers and automate your trades. Perfect for both beginners and advanced.

An App for All Levels 👈
AvaSocial is perfect whether you are a beginner or an experienced trader. Novice traders can gain exposure to the markets while learning & shorten the learning curve by following expert traders who can provide valuable insight. Experienced traders can save time by getting a clear view of the market, without having to perform daily research.

The Latest Innovation in Social Trading 👈
AvaSocial sets a new standard in social trading technology. With the AvaSocial mobile app, you can follow, and copy the trades of the very best traders. Use the wisdom of the experts, ask questions to your mentors or groups, and discover new and powerful strategies.

Copy Trading Made Simple 👈
Easily discover the most successful traders and qualified mentors, ask them questions 1-on-1 or in a group chat, then copy their trades with a tap.

Learn to Trade with The Best 👈
Enjoy your own transparent network of like-minded traders, chat with friends, and receive direct access to market opportunities all while staying one step ahead of the herd.

Real-Time Trading Signals 👈
Receive continuous real-time updates about your friends and experienced traders on your newsfeed, see what they’re doing, then comment, share, like a trade, or simply copy trading signals.

Share Your Best Trades 👈
Want to increase your following or just be proud of a big win? AvaSocial lets you celebrate your success with an image you can post across your entire social media network, including Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.

Earn Awards for The Trades 👈
Whether you close a big profit, use social features on the app, or enjoy a winning streak, you’ll receive special awards to fill your digital trophy case and show others how far you’ve come.

Hundreds of Markets- 24/7 👈
Trade with friends, stay motivated, and get inspired. Rethink the way you trade forex, indices, commodities, and shares by communicating with other traders in a truly pioneering 24/7 trading environment.

Trading App instruments 👈
➤ Forex: Over 60 forex pairs.
➤ Stocks: Over 600 different stocks.
➤ Indices: Over 30 popular Indexes.
➤ ETFs: Over 70 highly liquid ETFs.
➤ Forex options: Over 60 FX options.
➤ Metals: Precious Metals like Gold.
➤ Energies: Energy Products like Oil.
➤ Agricultural Commodities.
➤ Bonds & Treasuries.

title: AvaSocial: copy trading app

creator: Pelican Exchange
descriptionHtml:
➡️ Next Level Social Trading!
AvaSocial is a PERFECT copy-trading solution for traders of all levels - from a true beginner to a highly experienced veteran.

➡️ What Can You Find on AvaSocial?
The AvaSocial trading app includes a wide range of instruments to invest in and copy trade. There are more than 250 Forex pairs (like EUR USD & GBP USD), commodities (like Oil & Gold), indices (like NASDAQ & Dow-Jones), stocks, and much more!

➡️ Why Trade with AvaSocial?
Enjoy a smooth trading experience with specific sections for sharing ideas, group discussions, finding & filtering users to follow, quickly accessing your active positions, getting trading signals, or even sharing your trades & ideas via social media!

➡️ AvaSocial Features:
- Execute trades from hundreds of global markets 24hrs a day.
- Follow and copy trades from other users.
- Auto-copy expert traders.
- Talk to other traders and learn from the best.
- See trader performance.
- Create your own chat groups.
- Follow traders and receive their trade updates.
- Join Mentor groups, learn & follow their signals.

➡️ Who is AvaTrade?
AvaTrade is an AWARD-WINNING online CFD broker since 2006, with offices around the globe and regulation across 9 jurisdictions.
